Sentencas: The employment of safe and efficient energy conversion methods in various industries is of paramount importance.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?

Sentencas: Fuel cell technology is a reliable prime mover for energy systems.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?

Sentencas: In this paper, a comprehensive study is conducted to compare the thermodynamic, exergo-economic, and environmental facets of employing two types of fuel cells, embracing solid oxide fuel cell and molten carbonate fuel cell, as a driver in a trigeneration system producing cooling, heating, and power.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?

Sentencas: The subsystems consist of a heating unit and a generator-absorber heat exchanger for the solid oxide fuel cell-driven system, and two heating processes for the molten carbonate fuel cell-driven system.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?

Sentencas: The comparisons are made for 1 MW power generation by the fuel cells operating at ambient pressure and 0.85 for the fuel utilization factor.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?

Sentencas: Simulation results show that under the baseline design conditions, the energy and exergy efficiencies of the solid oxide fuel cell-driven system are 74.1% and 37.9%, respectively, whilst these efficiencies for the molten carbonate fuel cell-driven system are 78.5% and 52.4%, correspondingly.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?

Sentencas: Additionally, the comparisons reveal that the molten carbonate fuel cell-driven system outperforms the solid oxide fuel cell-driven one in terms of thermodynamic and environmental performances, but it is also more costly.
Titulo: Which methane-fueled fuel cell is of superior performance in CCHP applications; solid oxide or molten carbonate?
